original_title: Care Bears: Bears Share A Scare
overview: The animated series from the 1980s is back with eight episodes per DVD release. Includes: Treat Heart Baba and the Two Thieves, Doctor Brightenstein's Monster, Mystery of the Phantom, Most Ancient Gift, One Million C.B., Tugs the Brave, Bad Luck Friday and Food Frolics
tagline: There's nothing to fear when you are with the heartwarming Care Bears!
title: Care Bears: Bears Share A Scare
